text:
RT @AaronBell4NUL: EA UPDATE

The @EnvAgency have issued an update this evening, ahead of the midnight deadline.

Reading between the lines…
RT @JamesMBorg: My kitchen, 2 miles away and up a hill from #WalleysQuarry, in Keele has suddenly been filled with the smell of landfill! @…

@Tus_M_ @SuzVW @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA Do you happen to know whether calls are recorded and complaints logged? I will, of course, report via phone from now on but I want a record so I'll keep sending emails too 🙏

@a_merrydew @SuzVW @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA Please continue to report via phone if you can -  this is the official advice. 👇If not save your email and send once the system is back up. Isn’t it funny how these issues always happen on a weekend. #stopthestink https://t.co/XZ3wjNhNDW

RT @dorsetpolice: We're working with @EnvAgencySW and trading standards in the fight against catalytic converter thefts. 

If you want to p…

text: RT @SuzVW: @ClareDinnisEA you spoke to @AaronBell4NUL, perhaps you would like to inform him and the residents of Newcastle-under-Lyme why t…

@SuzVW @Tus_M_ @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA My emails have been bouncing back lately so I rang up this morning. I asked how long the email will be down and was told it *should* be working by the end of today. I was given another email address; however, the email address has not been changed on their website...

@DefraGovUK @BorisJohnson @MattHancock you are all aware of the public health crisis happening at Walley’s Quarry. If the poor regulation of @RedIndustries2 by @EnvAgencyMids results in an accident or death in Newcastle under Lyme your names will be smeared in mud. #stopthestink https://t.co/wPyRTkwcTz

text: @Tus_M_ @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @ShaunLintern They simply didn’t believe the community for a long time.  They thought we were just trying to annoy @RedIndustries2.
RT @scottdegg: Walleys Landfill is the air clean now?Can I come out of my ‘stink’ fallout room? Are the bodies piled high? Is it safe now?…

What @ClareDinnisEA doesn’t explain in her interviews is why @EnvAgency were so slow to react to the current crisis and that they increased the permitted waste tonnage to the landfill in Oct 2020 even though odour complaints were on the rise!Negligent! @ShaunLintern #stopthestink https://t.co/i7h920bJNu https://t.co/wPyRTkwcTz

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile Diaries
entity.description: A sister show to the BBC's `Countryfile' series, this rural affairs programme sees a team of presenters travel the length and breadth of the United Kingdom to cover stories related to the British countryside and the season of spring. As this period is a busy time of the year for the farming and outdoor communities in particular, regular topics covered include the production of food, nature conservation, and a look at a chosen area's culture and history. Stunning landscapes and a variety of wildlife also feature prominently.
